prompt: Design a compact mobile-optimized 404 Not Found page with efficient use of vertical space. Use a pure white background for maximum readability. Display a moderately-sized '404' in charcoal gray (Colors.grey[800]) with medium font weight. Show 'Not Found' as a concise subtitle in the same color. Include a brief, mobile-friendly message 'This page doesn\'t exist. Check the URL or go back.' in smaller gray text for quick scanning. Feature a compact 'Go Back' button with blue background and tight padding. Use minimal spacing with SizedBox heights of 12, 8, 18, and 24 pixels to conserve screen real estate. Apply modest padding of 16.0 on all sides. Ensure all text sizes are optimized for mobile viewing while maintaining hierarchy and readability.
